### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generation Setup
- No structures created yet.

### Copper Ore Mine at position (x)
- No structures created yet.

### Iron Ore Mine at position (x)
- No structures created yet.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to operate furnaces or other crafting entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
